channel.title: LSE:DGE on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Diageo’s Debra Crew Steps Down, CFO Named Interim Leader
item.description: Diageo Plc Chief Executive Officer Debra Crew stepped down after a bruising run in which the company’s stock has plummeted.
